actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to amend the Disaster Relief Act of 1974 to permit the proceeds of certain loans to be used to construct protective measures for the prevention of future damage.

summary.text: Provides, under the Disaster Relief Act of 1974, that specified loans made under such Act may be used to construct protective measures to prevent future damage to property as a result of high water levels.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Disaster Relief Act of 1974 to permit the proceeds of certain loans to be used to construct protective measures for the prevention of future damage.
